content: >this pattern is available for downloading also on payhip 1 with a pay what you want option >suomenkielinen ohje on testineulottu - lämmin kiitos odessa7 2 ammax 3 ja matleena 4 huomaathan että suomenkielisessä ohjeessa vain m-koko --- **pattern features ** english version - knitted cuff-down - instructions written for magic loop but dpns can be used as well - instructions written in metric and us terminology - three sizes small 46/42 sts medium 50/46 sts and large 54/50 sts - charts but no written instructions for the cable pattern heel increases and heel flap transition to the foot 1 https //payhip com/b/xsax 2 http //www ravelry com/people/odessa7 3 http //www ravelry com/people/ammax 4 http //lankapirtin blogspot com
